Press Kit

Resources for media coverage and press inquiries.

About Produciesta

Produciesta is a macOS and iOS app that transforms screenplays into audio productions using AI-powered voices. Writers, filmmakers, and producers can import their scripts, assign unique voices to each character, and generate professional-quality audioâ€”perfect for table reads, script reviews, or audiobook-style productions.

Key Features

  • Import screenplays from Fountain, Final Draft, PDF, and text formats
  • Automatic character and dialogue detection
  • AI-powered voice library with multiple voice options
  • Scene-by-scene audio generation and control
  • Export to MP3, WAV, and M4A formats
  • Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) integration with ElevenLabs (Pro)
  • Privacy-first design: screenplays never leave your device

Pricing

  • Free: Limited generations per month, basic voice library
  • Pro: $4.99/month or $39.99/year - unlimited generations, premium voices, BYOK

Availability

  • Mac App Store (macOS 26.0++)
  • App Store (iOS/iPadOS 26.0++)

Company Information

Intrusive Memory Productions is an independent software studio focused on creative tools for storytellers.

Quick Facts

  • Product: Produciesta
  • Company: Intrusive Memory Productions
  • Founded: 2024

Brand Guidelines

Name

The app name is Produciesta (one word, capital P). Please do not abbreviate or alter the name.

Colors

  • Primary Purple: #6366F1
  • Secondary Purple: #8B5CF6
  • Accent Cyan: #06B6D4

Logo Usage

  • Maintain clear space around the logo
  • Do not stretch, rotate, or distort the logo
  • Do not change the logo colors
  • Use the provided files; do not recreate the logo

Media Contact

For press inquiries, review copies, or interview requests:

Email: press@produciesta.app

We typically respond within 24-48 hours.
